sentences.sContent: There are lots of pear trees near the house.
sentences.sCn: 屋子近旁种着许多梨树。

sentences.sContent: There were lots of tourists rubbernecking in the street.
sentences.sCn: 许多游客在大街上伸长了脖子东张西望。

sentences.sContent: We have lots of engineers, and lots of scientists.
sentences.sCn: 我们有许多的工程师和科学家。
